Text:
är inte det här kopian som är fuckad i 15 minuter? (mot slutet)....

kan inte tänka mig att det cirkulerar så många rippar på 890mb av just denna film...
Please can you write in English if that is not too difficult for you !
A great film but this is not a good rip - movie just jerks all the way through which is a shame.

This really is mediocre quality. There's something wrong with the file, every few seconds, it skips a few frames, it becomes a very disjointed watching experience. Download only if you desperately wanna see it since no other rip is available. But you will be wise to wait for a better rip to turn up.
Excellent BFI Blu-Ray rip over at Btjunkie.  Do search under "Arabian Nights"
Rubbish, Even the nudity is not good !
